attributes.action: Fix the "Root" of the economic meltdown
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Prime Minister

Why dont you target the root of the economic meltdown by using your department of housing in buying the farewell value of the mortgaged property and leasing/renting it back to the homeowners. this can work for both the homeowners and investors alike. please email me should you wish to discuss this matter further. 

Yours sincerely

Joe Nuyda
+61401565527
joenuyda@bigpond.net.au

PS.

I have emailed the same proposal to President Obama, PM Kevin Rudd and I hope that someone would take this simple step to stem this crisis and not just use economic band-aid to solve the meltdown. Use this strategy with the varius stimulus packages already in place and move percepyion and financial security to a +ve mode

rejection.details: Please remove email addresses and phone numbers from the body of your petition and resubmit.
